My senjutsu sensed the area behind me being destroyed by the sheer force of the punch. Even a high class devil would be out by that.


I slashed down on his body as he brought his other arm covered in a thick layer of Touki to defend.


My sword sliced through most of it but he still defended enough to send a knee towards my stomach.


I increased my demonic power in the sword. He realised this and quickly stepped back to avoid his arm being lopped off.


What took place after that was intense clashes of fists and swords all over the place. Each punch I dodged dug trenches through the ground and each slash of my sword he dodged cut the land in two.


I was too lost in the fight to realise the time. We both jumped back to create a distance between us.


I still didn't use any magic except fire attribute swordsmanship.


"You should stop holding back… or you will die." He said. "Balance Breaker."


A golden light enveloped him and when the light subsided, he was covered in a golden armour with a lion's head in front of his chest area.


His aura had increased a lot and the axe in his hand was giving me a feeling of danger but… I am still stronger.


"Okay then, try to survive."


I let go of the sword because my next move would make it useless. I took a stance and light flickered in between my hands.


Black light twisted to form a sword of energy.


The Demonic Brilliance of Evil Light Sword.


– Sairaorg Bael –


Today had been a rough day even by his standards. First that bullshit they were trying to pull at the Youth Devil Gathering's Press Conference, then finding out that his cousin whom the entire underworld was searching for was in the storeroom of the same building, making out with a guy. And now, this…


"Sai, do not let that sword touch you. I didn't think I would ever see it again after he had passed but it looks like one of his descendants inherited it."


"What are you talking about, Regulus? Whose descendant inherited what exactly?"


"That light… It was the trademark move of Lucifer. The original one. It is the power which allowed him to stand on top of the entire devil race as their king. It cuts through all kinds of magic. With it Lucifer cut through even miracles and made all kinds of Sacred Gears useless. If it hits you, I will not be able to assist you."


Lucifer!


The shock he felt at the name was soon replaced by a feral grin.


"It just means, I don't have to get hurt, right? I can't wait to see the power of the Strongest House in the Underworld."




He lay on the ground, several cuts decorating his body with little to no energy left in him.


The guy, Sam, on the other hand, was only lightly winded.


The moment he started using magic, the tables turned. It took him a moment to realise that the sword he was using all this time was actually holding him back because he was afraid of breaking it in the fight.


Once that restriction was removed, all his attacks became stronger.


Not to mention, the sword cut through his Regulus Rey Leather armour as if it was nothing.


The worst part of all this was that he still had a feeling that the guy was holding back.


It did make him realise the difference between them and did a lot to humble him.


Yes, Rias will be safe with him.


Still, to think that she would find a Lucifer as a peerage member… Her luck was just…


– Sam –


I took a chance to sit beside the now fallen guy and use Scan on the orange haired Sacred Gear on our side.


We were inside a mansion which they used for training. Sairaorg was laying on a bed while Regulus was on our side protecting him.


I on the other hand offered to heal him from the injuries.


Devils were beings of magic and being cut by a sword which erases magic itself, acted like poison to him, not that much different from normal light poisoning. It was actually worse.


So, I was taking this time to remove the poison and heal him.


How much time will it take? That depends on which Skill Regulus has to offer.


A Ranked Nemean Lion Bloodline

A Ranked Projectile Negation

A Ranked Severing

C Ranked Physique

…


There were several other skills but these were the strongest ones. Its powers were capped by its owner so the physique and other base stats were only at C Rank.


I started a copy on his A Ranked Severing Skill.


Regulus Nemea is said to possess the power to cut through anything.


I seriously doubt it but A Ranked Severing was still something.


I can just imagine this Skill coupled with the Lucifer Trait and the Belphegor's Tear. Add in a good sword and the cutting power behind the Skill would make even a Heavenly Dragon think twice before taking it head on.


Today's fight was quite satisfactory for me. The experience of fighting with the Vali team on a daily basis showed and I wasn't pushed back.


The real surprise was 'The Demonic Brilliance of Evil Light' cutting through the armour so easily.


The effect of restraining a Sacred Gear, is this where Rizevim got his idea of the Sacred Gear Canceller?


"So, you are a Lucifer? I thought they didn't intervene in matters of the Underworld"


"I have nothing to do with the Lucifers. Consider me a bastard child, if you will. The Lucifer House probably doesn't even know of my existence as far as I know."


"You are a Pure Blooded Devil. So your mother…?"


"Is not in this world."


"I'm sorry."


"Don't worry. You didn't know."


"How did you meet Rias?"


"I was injured and she saved my life. I didn't have anywhere to go and we stuck together since then."


"I see. I am glad she has someone by her side now. What happened with her was probably a whim of her father at the start. For him it was a way to establish stronger relations with his friend but things went to hell when Kiba died. Rias running away was a big slap on the faces of both the houses and now even if they wanted to, they can't step back. This whole thing is a mess. They didn't have any reason to hurry."


"It was Riser's doing. He was spying on Rias and realised that she had obtained a Longinus user and pushed the matters forward. Her father agreed. He himself gloated to Rias which was the final straw for her and she ran."


"… so that's what happened. I didn't know that."


"Now you know why I want to beat him so badly in front of the whole underworld."


"I would have beaten him up anyway but sure. I don't see a problem why you couldn't do the same. So, what are you guys doing?"


I explained to him in brief about what exactly we were doing  currently.


"I plan to use the merits earned from spying on them to help clear her status and free her. If that doesn't work… well, we will think of something."


"You need strength. The Underworld runs on strength. Once you are strong enough, you can get everything. Moreover, with your blood, half the Underworld will get on their knees to get you back. Clearing her status will be easy enough."


"Hmm, I hope so."


We talked about several things. I delayed the removal of poison to make it take an hour or so so to copy Regulus’ Skill.


Sairaorg himself had a Vapula Bloodline and a defective Devil Physique which was the reason for his low Demonic Power. As for his other Skills, he had Physique and Touki at C Rank along with Martial Arts.


I got the Touki Card from him to push my own Touki to a higher level. A little more and I will be at the B Rank for Touki Skill.


My attention was diverted by a message. I checked it and found that Vali was asked by Azazel to stop Kokabiel’s attack.


Things were going as we had thought. With this news, we left the place. With the Peace Conference coming around, things were going to become hectic soon.

Story 5:

Chapter 2: Collecting Skills


________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


- Samuel White -


A week into the world and my transformation has completed. My demonic power has also increased a great deal. It was a bit lower than High Class but was increasing at a decent rate. We were hoping that I would get to that level of power soon even if I just trained myself for a few days.


Four days were left from the day I had decided to go and meet a member of the Lucifuge Peerage. Wow, that felt odd.


Today however, the Vali team were returning.


I had actually held back at copying the Skills from Rias. I gave her a reason and we both agreed to accept that it was quite viable.


The reason was… if Rias had C Ranked Luck, which was the Highest Ranked Skill on her entire menu, how much Luck would Issei have?


Although my Demonic Power is slightly lower than a High Class Devil’s, my overall strength reached that of a High Class Devil recently. I could even fight at a higher level with promotion.


For the last four days, all I did was go out to copy skills at night, return back home, cook food and train till we dropped. Ate food, rested, again trained till we dropped. Finally clean up and go to sleep. Rinse and repeat. My System showed my comprehensive strength to be D Rank now. It meant, I could copy stuff from C Rankers and hopefully Vali Team won’t be above that. At least not all of them.


Also, with my promotion to the D Rank, I got a few new upgrades. The range again increased and was now one metre more at 3 metres. I got another Card with a special effect. It was similar to the first one except with a different function. It lets me copy the Skills of more than one person in my range only once.


“Do you remember the plan?” My new roommate asked me and I nodded.


We were going to hide everything about my past from everyone. For everyone else, I was an experimental baby created by the cult members who were trying to sacrifice me to summon something. I was already a devil by birth although I didn’t know my parents. This would make any bloodlines I copy easy to hide or rather explain if I do get found out.


Apparently, when Rias did find me, I was alone. The cult members were all dead. Kuroka didn’t see me as a human and I could easily be passed as a natural devil.


It was a good plan and we agreed to it. If someday I awakened some new powers, I would know what else was put into the cauldron to create me.


At this point, I was a highly talented guy who learned things at a great speed.


The reason behind this was also the skills I had planned to copy from these people.


I would first meet them and then make a list of skills each of them have. If there are things beyond our expectations, we will change the plans the very next day, we will decide to copy the skills from them.


These days, Rias has been working on different forms of Magic. The plan was for her to join the Vali Team and thus the Khaos Brigade. She will hide her identity and will thus need to be able to use different magic to fight. She did know general Devil Magic but didn’t use it often as a medium of attack because the Power of Destruction was just too good at that.


On that note, I explained to Rias the details of her Gremory Bloodline. It turns out that while they had much larger demonic power reserves compared to the other devils and even some houses, the Gremory weren’t known to have any definite power. Supposedly, their power was Camel Taming, which was what the first Gremory, Runeas, was known for, her love of camels.


Rias however hated camels. No, to be more precise, she was scared of camels.


Thankfully, the Gremory Trait was different from this.


The Gremory Luck thing had some truth to it because the real power of the Gremory Bloodline was Luck Manipulation. Although, at lower levels, it was just passive.


I don’t think it would even show up unless she developed her powers to C Rank or above. I could hazard a guess that her luck with Riser ran out because her father was working against her while her brother couldn’t exactly support her. Her father was stronger and her luck was suppressed. It was passive and nothing could be controlled or even known for sure but… none of it stopped her anger flaring up towards her father.


She was now training to improve her powers to control them consciously.


It was hard. Extremely so.


We didn’t have any line of thought to train such an abstract power like Luck.


Currently, we were only deciding on the outcomes of a coin toss or picking cards from the deck. She was starting with these but I saw a craze in her eyes when she was training these powers. I had to convince her to tone down the training she had planned initially, which involved her walking through a room which was being showered by magic and forcing her luck to save her.


It sounded like Observation Haki training but instead of awakening her Observation Haki, she was forcing her passive Luck to get a feel of the power and try to control it consciously.


According to her, real danger would force her Demonic Powers to develop faster, which despite me not wanting to agree was actually true.


I in the meantime learned the Devil’s skin contact healing from her. It was so we could heal each other after training.


I mean, we were sleeping together… naked anyway, so, why not make good use of it… well more good use of it.


She was good for keeping my nightmares away and I did the same for her.


“I do. I have too many inconsistent memories to make it qualify that I was experimented on and the rest can be attributed to the ritual.” I said as I pulled her closer to me, her hands wrapped around me as well and she lay her head on my chest. “You on the other hand should avoid training that can get you hurt like today. At least until I find a way to heal you properly.”


“I was just trying to see how it would work. I had no idea what the Gremory power was. I don’t think anyone does. They still think it’s Camel Taming because my ancestor had taken a liking to camels. Those weird creepy….ugh. So, now that I know of this, I want to master it. I want to rub it in the face of someone who was selling me for a Bloodline that he couldn’t even use his own bloodline.”


Yup. That hate is strong.


“Yes. I will support you in this but first let me learn a skill that can cure you if things go wrong. I think Kuroka’s Senjutsu would be better suited for something like this.”


“Yes. Take a nap. Whatever happens,we will face it together tomorrow.”


“Hmm.”


No other words were said. This was becoming the normal routine for us. The basic knowledge of Senjutsu and Touki helped me to regulate my blood flow to certain areas. So, not all of our cuddles were awkward. The mornings were different though. A half asleep me cannot control anything and she is greeted by Sam Jr. every morning.


But hey, like Kazuma says, I am an advocate of True Gender Equality.


- Kuroka -


She snuck into the room to check upon the runaway princess and her new partner.


To be honest, the decision to take her in was a bit random. She did realise that she had left Shirone in a very difficult situation and although she meant well for her, if it hadn’t been for Sirzechs Lucifer, her little sister would have been dead. Then, this princess spent a long time getting her sister to open up a bit. She missed her old Shirone but compared to what things could have been, she was still grateful to have a sister at this point. Vali had surprisingly been quite easy about the whole situation. So had Arthur and Le Fay, the former being in the same situation in a way. As for Bikou, the monkey didn’t care. Overall, the entire group had been quite alright with their new addition.


Rias was someone with potential and with being on the run and encountering difficult battles, this potential would only be revealed.


It was her new pawn that she was worried about.


There had been no information about those cult members. They were doing a summoning of some sorts.


The boy was a sacrifice.


At this point, different people have different reactions to others. She didn’t mind the good reactions. It was the bad ones that worried her.


Rias was already broken from her situation. If the guy turned out to be a traitor, it would completely break her.


Vali had told her to let it be and let her handle it but as someone who brought her into this group, she thought it as her responsibility to look after her, if only slightly.


Thus, she snuck into the bedroom to see how things were going.


Though, she was not expecting the scene in front of her.


Two bodies, wrapped around each other, without a shred of clothing on each. She could see the way they wrapped their arms around each other, protectively that they were quite comfortable in this position which indicated that it was not the first time this had happened. She felt the energy around them, relaxed. It was much different than what she had felt from Rias, the first night she had brought her here. It seemed that the boy did a lot of good for her in such a short time.


She then proceeded to put a hand on the boy and check him for any sign of spells used in case he was actually taking advantage of the princess and what she found almost made her rethink her results. She again rechecked and the results were the same.


The boy was completely different than a week ago.


The Demonic Power was almost at the level of a High Class Devil. His body had become more toned as well. His life force was aligned, signs of a Touki user and his muscles had changed almost to the extent of being unrecognisable.


What the heck nyaa!?


Just what the fuck happened in the last week to make this guy into this? She then remembered that the guy took eight pawns, the same as the Red Dragon kid. A guy with the same potential as the Boosted Gear user while not having a Sacred Gear of his own. Is this what that was? A devil guy with the potential of a Longinus?


This is quite appealing. She could see why the princess wrapped herself around him so quickly. A good choice of mate.


– Sam –


I woke up surrounded by softness. The soft feeling on my back, making me warm. I moved slightly and my hand grabbed something soft in front of me again.


"Ahhhh."


I knew that sound and to make things even better/worse the sound made the softness behind me shake lightly. I pressed my elbow behind me, pressing into the softness. 


"Mmanyaa."


. … 


… . 


I gripped the one in front of me because I recognized the voice. My senses spread lightly over the area, searching for an area that can be easily defended.


Next thing, I tightened my body, my touki flaring slightly as I took Rias in my arms and in the next moment, I was on the other end of the room with a window behind us.


The bed crumbled by my sudden move.


It was at this moment that I saw the figure who was hugging me from behind.


Black hair, golden eyes, buxom figure but the most prominent features would probably be the cat ears and tails behind her as she took a defensive position like a cat.


The movement awakened Rias who looked around, alerted and saw the person. "Kuroka!"


Ah… I might have jumped the gun.


"Sam, it's fine she’s a friend." I know that now. I let her stand up again and relaxed. Kuroka relaxed too.


"I am sorry. I was surprised when I felt another person behind me."


She rubbed her head sheepishly.


"I was tired and you two looked so comfortable so I decided to take a nap to nyaa~. Still did you not like me pressing on your back to react like that? Nyahahahaha."


By this time, Rias also understood what was happening and just held her head, massaging it. She created a magic circle and fixed the damage to the room. I too lent a hand and Kuroka just watched.


With things fixed, we sat down in the dining room. I warmed something for her to eat, sitting beside Rias too.


"It was a good reaction time nyaa. I think I even sensed Senjutsu and Touki just then. Good job on the use."


I took the opportunity to scan her as we were sitting relatively close.


C Ranked Enhanced Senses

C Ranked Enhanced Speed

C Ranked Demonic Power Reserves

C Ranked Devil Magic

C Ranked Space Magic

C Ranked Senjutsu

C Ranked Yojutsu

D Ranked Enhanced Physique

D Ranked Barrier Magic

D Ranked Poison Resistance


… 


… 


There were tons of skills in her list.


"Thank you." I nodded lightly.


"He is very shy, isn't he nyaa~. Then again, the position you two were in, maybe not." She smirked at Rias.


I looked at Rias and grabbed her hand under the table and she smiled at me in return. With the signal received, I started the copy.


C Ranked Skill took 20 minutes in the range to complete.


It was a drastic increase from 5 minutes for a D Ranked one. I did get a chance to copy a few of them from a group of magicians.


Thankfully, she was busy eating and talking to us so it was quite fine. I wonder how much time the higher ranked skills will take to be copied


What I copied was the C Ranked Senjutsu because it was the best one I could get out of her. It had all the things I needed for the moment. Sensing, Defence Ignore, Healing and Hiding Presence among other things. It’s single-handedly one of the best skills out there. I understood it even more when I knew her experiences.


Meanwhile, Rias explained about my situation to her. She looked a little sympathetic because she was also a part of the experiments and maybe understood what it felt like.


Dammit, now I feel bad for lying to her.


It was still early in the morning. 5 am to be precise so we decided to rest for the day. We had barely had four hours of sleep and with the amount of training we were putting in, cutting on sleep is not something we can afford.


Kuroka decided to get in with us. It might have been my imagination but I felt Rias get even closer to me, her legs and thighs covering my crotch directly this time. Kuroka sniggered but got back in the previous position only this time, there was no kimono in place and the softness I had felt before was pushed to a whole new level.


Was she jealous of Kuroka sharing our bed?


Touki and the newly upgraded Senjutsu only helped so much. So, I caressed her back lightly. She opened her eyes a little and looked at me on which I slowly approached her and my lips touched her forehead. She looked at me, wide eyed but then a light dusting of pink appeared on her cheeks and she hid her face in my chest. It seemed to have relaxed her a little.


Yup, she was jealous alright.


With these many emotions running around, how does one even think of a harem?


________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


“So, this is the new member you picked up?” Bikou jumped around me while asking. His monkey side showing up.


“Hello. My name is Samuel but you can call me Sam.”


“Hello hello newbie. You can call me The Great Bikou or Senior or Senpai.”


“My name is Arthur Pendragon. This is my little sister Le Fay Pendragon.”


“Vali.”


“And you already know me. We had a very enjoyable night together. Oh, I liked it when you were rough. I mean breaking the bed.”


The last one didn’t need any introduction. She had noticed Rias’ emotions and was at this point just teasing the two of us.


Le Fay grew red at the reveal while Arthur only rolled his eyes. The other two didn’t even react.


The one whom this was aimed at however did react.


Rias’ lips twitched slightly but she controlled herself quickly.


I, in the meantime, scanned the people and took in their skills.


B Ranked Divine Dividing

C Ranked Demonic Power Reserves

C Ranked Devil Magic

C Ranked Martial Arts

D Ranked Demonic Power Control

D Ranked Dragon Bloodline

E Ranked Lucifer Bloodline


…


…


His Lucifer Bloodline was pretty undeveloped. Then again, I guess he was always focusing on his Divine Dividing and never really focused any attention on his Lucifer side.


His dragon side is much stronger than his Lucifer side.


I thought for a moment and started the copy of the Lucifer Bloodline.


Why so? Because I was already a Devil and that was the Top Bloodline among the Devils. Sure, the Dragon Bloodline can be cool but me, getting a dragon side will be noticed by Kuroka and Bikou instantly. And that would raise a lot of questions. Not to mention the extra weakness to Dragon Slayer and Dragon Tamer abilities.


Thankfully, the E Ranked Skill Cards take only 2 minutes to copy.


It was done very soon.


The next up was Bikou.


B Ranked Monkey King Bloodline

C Ranked Enhanced Physique

C Ranked Touki

C Ranked Enhanced Sense

C Ranked Enhanced Strength

C Ranked Enhanced Endurance

C Ranked Enhanced Reflexes

C Ranked Magic Resistance

C Ranked Staffmanship

C Ranked Martial Arts

C Ranked Acrobatics

D Ranked Senjutsu


…


…


I started the copy on the C Ranked Touki. Although, the B Ranked Monkey King Bloodline is very enticing, I am pretty sure that the scent of a Youkai will be noticed on me very soon. Moreover, I didn’t know if I would grow a tail all of a sudden or not. It was too risky. Physique can be trained by oneself. My Physique is almost at D Rank now. But Skills couldn’t be trained that easily without proper help and instructions and I doubted that I would find many High levelled Touki users lazing around for me to copy from that easily.


Arthur’s Skill List was much more stable. It looked like the Skill List of someone who was groomed to be a king, which was not exactly far from the truth.


C Ranked Swordsmanship

C Ranked Reinforcement Magic

C Ranked Strategy

C Ranked Holy Swordsman

D Ranked Martial Arts


…


…


Le Fay on the other hand was probably the one with the most Skills among this group. She was basically the encyclopaedia of magic. Apart from her D Ranked Magic Power Reserves which was still quite good for her age, she was basically a Genius in all types of Human Magic including some really esoteric ones.


“So, those bastards were doing some kind of genetic experiments on Sam and then tried to use him in a ritual?”


“Do you have the ritual’s details? Maybe I could figure out what they were doing?” Le Fay asked.


“The entire place was destroyed. There were no survivors.”


“Do you remember anything, Sam?”


“I… have too many memories. I don’t know which ones are my own and which ones are implanted and which ones come from…”


“Come from?”


This was when Rias took control of the conversation. “I believe that Sam might have some abilities of a Seer.”


….


….


“What!”


“I know it’s very hard to believe but from the things he has told me, I am inclined to believe that it’s true. Some of them were things that only I knew of. Some things are completely different but some are exactly the same.”


At this point, a different voice joined in the conversation.


“Such abilities are not unknown. Although, very rarely are they strong enough. The Biblical God was one of the users of Divination too and so is Indra. The future is not fixed but they can provide some clues to what it can be.”


Two light blue wings appeared on Vali’s back and I unconsciously used Scan on it.


A Ranked Principle of Supremacy

A Ranked Divide

A Ranked Reflect

A Ranked Poison Magic

A Ranked Dragon’s Aura

A Ranked Vanishing Dragon Bloodline

A Ranked Dragon Magic


There were several other skills but I couldn’t even touch those.


I noticed that there were no skills regarding body or magic power.


“So, anything we should know about the future?” Arthur asked, looking at me.


Things went quiet for a bit at the question.


“It’s what I wanted to ask Vali about.” Rias asked and the guy in question looked at us in confusion. “Have you heard anything about Excalibur Sword fragments being stolen from the church?”


“… there has been such news.”


“Is Kokabiel missing? I asked.


His eyes narrowed but he answered nonetheless. “I did hear Azazel talking about it. What did you see?”


“I saw him trying to start another Great War.”


…


“The fuck?!” Bikou shouted.


Arthur looked stunned and Kuroka also froze over. Vali on the other hand paused for a moment before asking me to continue.


“He was planning to merge the fragments of the Excalibur into a sword. He has the assistance of Valper Galilei, the exiled church Archbishop who was in charge of the Holy Sword Project. He then planned to kill Rias and Sona Sitri along with their peerages, sparking a  Great War among the three factions.”


“So I take it that this was one of the odd visions you had because Rias is with us now.”


I nodded.


“What else?”


“You intervened and saved them and took Kokabiel back on Azazel’s orders.”


Kuroka was tensed about Koneko and I looked at her and reassured her that it was fine in my visions but then again, so was Kiba.


“Vali, I am going to bring back Shirone.”


“I don’t think it would be a good idea at this moment. I think we should send this information to Rias’ brother who can send a few of his peerage members to protect them and in the meantime if we want to help out, we can find out about Kokabiel and keep guard.”


“Why would we do that? Isn’t Kokabiel strong? We can fight him without anyone coming after us.” Bikou perked up and I saw Vali nodding his head too.


I sighed.


“Kokabiel’s attack would lead the Leaders of the Three Factions to team up and sign a Peace Treaty. The Three Factions will join hands. It will save many lives. As for Kuroka, there is something I need to check if it’s true or not. If it is, there might be a way to prove her innocence. It can at least make her make up with her sister.”


“What thing?” Kuroka looked at me with narrowed eyes.


“The Naberius were conducting experiments on the Youkai for a long time. You were not the first one. Your mother was in a relationship with the lead scientist.” I saw her freeze up. “He was a selfish guy who never returned her feelings but in the end, she hid all the data about the experiments in Shirone’s hair clip. What I want to know is, was your mother’s name Fujimai and did Shirone have a black cat Hairpin?”


The girl nodded with difficulty.


“Then it might be worth checking.”


….


“D-did, he… was he?”


“Your father… yes. And no, he died before you became a part of that guy’s peerage. They just continued the research.”


….


“Excuse me. I need some time alone.” She got up and left and no one tried to stop her.


“What else do you know?” Vali asked me.


“I… just saw memories and visions of Rias to be honest. You guys were appearing sometimes but I don’t know things in detail about you. Although, I saw the glimpses of both you and Issei unlocking the real power of Ddraig and Albion.” 


“The Juggernaut Drive?” He asked.


I shook my head. “No. The full power. The powers that were sealed away from Albion’s memories even. His poison and Reflect. I don’t know how you unlocked it yet.”


“Do you know something about it, Albion?”


“A lot of our powers were locked away when we were both sealed but what he says does feel nostalgic to me.”


We discussed a few things and they planned what to do with the situation. I told them about some things like Loki’s attack and them stealing Fenrir and Diodora Astaroth’s attack but nothing in detail. Despite what it was portrayed, these guys didn’t want to cause widespread destruction. They were teenagers and teenagers messed up. Supernatural teenagers even more so than not.
